1.content: Which of these characters gets shrunk???
1.title: Who Shrinks???

11.content:
Aang is a lucky fly.
Literally cause he can fly and get to places more faster than the others.
Now which Giantess Girl can and will help him???
11.title: Little Aang

111.content:
Suddenly a tan barefoot came down next to anng scaring him to fly up and notice it was katara
How will he get her attention he think the flys up to her
111.title: Katara

1111.content: She then sees you and . . .
1111.title: Eyes

11111.content:
"Aang is that you? How did you get so small"
Katara then looks at aang with . . .
11111.title: Realize it's aang

111111.content:
"You know, I could have some fun with you" she says with a grin.
Katara then puts you . . .
111111.title: Evil

113.content: Anng tries to fly to katara but about halfway there he is blocked by a face a smashes into it and before he can peel away a hand grabs him "little bug you will have the honor of being crushed under the perfect feet of the princess of the fire nation" anng hears causing his heart to sink as he is brought around to the front of azula's face "haha finally I have caught the avatar I can't kill you now cause then you'll just be reborn and yet again a threat to us now where should I keep u till I arrive home to keep you as my personal slave for the rest of your pathetic life"
113.title: Azula

choices: He passes out in Azula's shoe (punished for it when they arrive)
She has him lick her sole for the journey (head start for licking clean later)
He slides under her toes and Azula 'happily' toys with him for the entire trip
1131.content:
I have just the place to put you'' Azula chuckled as Aang kept his eyes focused on hers until he heard the click of her armour separating as she removed her boot exposing a pale foot practically dripping with sweat. Aang's eyes bugged out, he tried to escape but he was easily tripped, flipped and then flattened by damp flesh. The sudden pressure winds him causing Aang to gasp, filling his lungs with her foot smell and his mouth with her sweat. As Azula lifted her foot Aang was surprised to be lifted also, the sweat sticking him to her foot like a piece of paper. Azula turned her foot to see her current prisoner, soon to be (foot) slave and frowned slightly ''not where I'd hoped you'd be...'' she said, her toes wiggling enthusiastically ''... but still you should be honoured to even touch my foot, I hope you take as much pleasure acclimatising to your new position as I will 'breaking' you in'' she laughed as she roughly shoved her foot back into he armoured boot.

Ignoring the intense pressure on his body Aang could be forgiven in thinking he was back in the swamp; the extreme heat, humidity as well as actual water from how much the firebending prodigy sweated and a mildly unpleasant (though different) smell nearly suffocating, it was a very difficult experience.

So..... on the trip home does anything happen to Aang
1131.title: Shoe

12.content:
Sokka is shrunken down aswell.
This warrior of the Southern water tribe has to fight his way to the top, literally.
Which of these Giantess can help him???
12.title: Small Sokka

choices: Plays with him in her mouth
122.content:
Suddenly a trap springs made of earth locking sokka in then toph appears shaking the earth with her dirty feet "now what type of bug Is getting squashed next" toph said as she lifted her dirty foot sokka begged "no toph no please its me sokka" being blind toph could hear him very well and using her earthbending shots him into her hand "is that so your gonna be a good little worrier for me or your gonna wish I crushed you
Next toph
122.title: Toph

13.content:
Zuko, prince of the Fire Nations.
He got small aswell.
Who are the Giantess which he can get help???
13.title: Shrunken Zuko

14.content:
Jet is having revenge on the Avatar, he wants to kill one off his friends.
If he succeeds is only a question.
14.title: Bug Jet

15.content: You can also follow the story's of the Shrunken avatar girls.
15.title: Other.....

152.content: Katara ends up being shrunk. Who is going to be unaware of the ant sized waterbender?
152.title: Shrunken Katara

1523.content: Azula, Ty lee or Mai?
1523.title: One of the firebender girls

15231.content:
Katara was doing some water bending until she mysteriously shrunk down to about 2 inches tall. As she tries to figure out how this happened, a shadow came over her and she turns to see the princess of the fire nation herself, Azula, standing over her and is looking at her with an evil smile on her face. She bends down to grab her and lifts her up to her face while Katara was feeling very scared by her.

"This is very unexpected, yet very interesting. I was gonna go get the Avatar, but instead, I got his little water bending friend. You'll have the highest honor of being my new personal slave, little one. Now, I know where to put your small self in for safekeeping." Azula said.

With that said, Azula traps Katara in her
15231.title: Is there hope left?

info.brief_description: Avatar Book 4: Follow the adventures of the avatar and his friends, when shrunken!
info.description: Aang, Sokka and Zuko are all the size of a tiny, little ant. Now follow this untold story, and see what they are going through.
